apple_vendor_description: This heartfelt emoji on Apple devices depicts a loving couple, both rendered with rich, deep dark skin tones, embracing with a vibrant red heart symbol prominently displayed between them. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading imbues the figures with a lifelike presence, while soft gradients and subtle highlights emphasize their connection and affection.  The gentle curves and smooth edges of the emoji convey a sense of unity and romantic partnership, making it a perfect digital expression of love and commitment between two individuals.
